name: MergeLists
tooltip:
A `MergeLists` defines a set of multi value predicates on a set of subjects which can be merged automatically.
Restrictions can be placed on the origin of the changes, and a general condition can be evaluated first.

subjects.tooltip: The subjects to which the handler applies

predicates.tooltip:
The predicates for which changes can be merged.
NOTE: These may only be multi value predicates.

values.parent: only merge changes from the parent (e.g. the server)
values.both: changes from the parent and/or the current transaction
